term.title: ideal chromatography

item.text: Chromatographic process, where no peak-broadening effects (such as diffusion, slow mass transfer, etc.) operate.

notes.item: This is a hypothetical case, implying that the plate number (in chromatography) is infinite.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 1591. 'Nomenclature for non-linear chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 1593 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668081591)
